metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14493 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in OpenCV before 4.1.1. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function cv::XMLParser::parse at modules/core/src/persistence.cpp.

notes.Note: ccdm94> in bionic and earlier, the file with the vulnerable code is modules/core/src/persistence.cpp.

criterions.comment: opencv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
